title: Secret Successful Heist
description: SSH is a Heist tell all journal based on real events. The book follows the step by step decision and thoughts that allow Allen AKA Mark Douglas to pull off a successful secret heist. He depicts how instead of depending on others during the 2008 recession, he carved out his own piece of the American dream pie and ate it too. Mark was able to start with something illegal and small coactivating it into many legit streams of money, helping many along the way. Modern day Robin Hood or just another criminal, we'll let you decide. Learn how a young man lost it all, during the Great Recession. What he did to get it all back, plus more with a heist and legal loopholes still used today by many companies, world leaders, actors and athletes alike.
author: DTxYme
